column5: Ok i need to settle a dispute here:  Take into consideration how many different types of shirts their is, T shirts , golf shirts long sleeve dress shirts...well u get the idea.  Now how many shirts total should a man have?
Whoa... good question... never thought about it.  7+7+7+7... gonna say about 20-30.

90-100?  Seriously?  Even at an average of 30$/shirt that is 3k you would be spending on just the shirt part of your wardrobe.  I have maybe 5 shirts I wear regularly and then a few other odd ones for around the house/outdoor trips.
Don't forget about all the ones with the tears and holes in them that your not allowed to wear Lol
i can honestly say that I don't own one single dress shirt or golf style shirt. lol Yet...I have a closet full of t-shirts - go figure.
i have a load of t-shirts....and a half dozen hoodies...  other then that i have 3-4 lol
Those are exactly the kind I wear on fishing/camping trips...
Yep.
I'll have to ask my wife , i don't have a clue

This is a tough one. I don't "need" that many shirts, but the wife keeps on buying them. I have no clue what I've got so I'll take some guesses: T-shirts 25, long sleeve t shirts 5, dress shirts 20, casual shirts 12, golf shirts 10, hoodies/sweaters 10...in other words waaaayyy too many and I give a bunch away every year. My wife truly has a shopping problem
What's next week.. shoes.. grow some pants!
Only need one of the same kind
x2
Ok....Who said 90-100? Must be lookin to win Best Dressed Angler award.
All a retired guy needs is some tees and a funeral outfit to wear to someone else's funeral   vance
Shoes !! Good idea . 2 pairs casual, 1 dress, 2 sandals and 1 winter boots.
Even 10-20 is far too many, you can only wear one at a time.
Most of my shirts are disposables. 1 day of nicotine stains from greenhouse tomatoes and the shirt is ruined. Not worth trying to wash. I have just enough decent shirts not worn when farming.
I have over 50. I need them to match my fishing rods.  As for shoes/boots. I have a few of those but I like my pointed cowboy boots. They are great for kicking someone in the    that is deserving!
Skeets, you are such a "HAPPY" man.
